ing: 1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
des: "Quick and easy with little fuss. I used to spend a lot of time simmering and seasoning and this tastes the same! Serve with shredded cheddar on top and a loaf of French or Italian bread. Salad on the side and you have a meal! "
ins: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, cook beef until brown.  Stir in beans, tomatoes, onion and bell pepper; reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes.
